授業方法:
This course is currently planned for face-to-face format. Lessons will include mini lectures, discussions, presentations, and peer and instructor writing feedback sessions.

NOTE 1: This course is intended to improve students’ academic English skills. Therefore, all materials, instruction, communications, and assignments are in English. Students are expected to only use English.

NOTE 2: This class is very demanding, involving a lot of reading and writing assignments. Additionally, thorough preparation and active class participation are expected.

トピック.授業計画1: Some class time will involve the use of reading assignments and preparation tasks for discussion, formulating responses to articles, and planning for written responses, which will be submitted as course writing assignments. Some class time will involve student presentations of assigned and self-selected research articles. Some class time will involve peer and instructor feedback sessions on writing assignments and revision planning.
トピック.授業外学習2:
Student preparation outside of class meetings includes:
(1) Carefully reading academic articles and completing preparation tasks,
(2) Preparation for leading and participating in discussions,
(3) Conducting literature research on assigned and self-selected topics,
(4) Preparation for presentations, and
(5) Writing, using peer and instructor feedback and revising drafts.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Writing assignments, including drafts and revisions
成績評価Grading2: Active weekly participation, completion of weekly reading assignments and preparation tasks, leading and participating in discussions, giving individual and group presentations, and completing research tasks.
